name: Superhero Ninja Pup - Ultimate Mutant Paw Patrol: Ninja Turtles Edition
name_original: Superhero Ninja Pup - Ultimate Mutant Paw Patrol: Ninja Turtles Edition
description:
Love Paw Patrol and Ninja Turtle? Then This App is For You! Create and Design your own Ninja Pup!!

Feeling Excited After Watching the Latest Paw Patrol? Can't stop thinking about Ninja Turtle? Get this App Now!

Choose from a huge selection of costumes, masks, and more and make your very own character!

-Hundreds of Costume Combinations!
-Hours of Fun!
-Really Easy to Use!
-Fun for Kids and Adults!

Share your Pup with Family and Friends through Facebook, Instagram or Email.

Start Create Your Own Pup Today, Download Now!
